Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equipped = false MouseDown = false
Void = nil VoidParts = {}
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
ReloadTime = 3
BasePellet = Instance.new("Part") BasePellet.Name = "Pellet" BasePellet.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Reddish brown") BasePellet.Material = Enum.Material.Granite BasePellet.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePellet.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePellet.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePellet.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePellet.Anchored = false BasePellet.CanCollide = false BasePellet.Locked = true BasePellet.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function Fire(Direction, Projectile, Velocity, Damage, Duration)
local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.Parent = Projectile
local ProjectileHit
ProjectileHit = Projectile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and humanoid and character ~= Character then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) ProjectileHit:disconnect() end end end) Debris:AddItem(Projectile, 10) BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(((Projectile:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Projectile:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Projectile:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2)) BodyVelocity.velocity = Direction * Velocity Delay(Duration, function() BodyVelocity:Destroy() end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Equipped = true Void = Instance.new("Model") Void.Name = "Void" Angle = 0 for i = 1, 5 do local VoidPart = Instance.new("Part") VoidPart.Name = "VoidPart" VoidPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really black") VoidPart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic VoidPart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block VoidPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom VoidPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth VoidPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth VoidPart.Anchored = true VoidPart.CanCollide = false VoidPart.Locked = true VoidPart.Size = Vector3.new(10, 0.2, 10) local BlockMesh = Instance.new("BlockMesh") BlockMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, (1 + (0.005 * i)), 1) BlockMesh.Parent = VoidPart VoidPart.Parent = Void table.insert(VoidParts, VoidPart) end Spawn(function() while Equipped and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso.Parent do if Angle == 360 then Angle = 0 end Angle = Angle + 0.05 local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 6.5), {Character}) if Hit then if not Void.Parent then Void.Parent = Character end for i, v in pairs(VoidParts) do v.CFrame = CFrame.new(Torso.Position.X, EndPosition.Y, Torso.Position.Z) * CFrame.Angles(0, (Angle + i), 0) end else Void.Parent = nil end wait() end end) Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and not MouseDown then MouseDown = true if Pellet and Pellet.Parent then Pellet:Destroy() end Pellet = BasePellet:Clone() BodyPosition = Instance.new("BodyPosition") BodyPosition.maxForce = Vector3.new(((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2)) BodyPosition.Parent = Pellet Pellet.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.Y * 2), 0) BodyAngularVelocity = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") BodyAngularVelocity.maxTorque = Vector3.new(((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2), ((Pellet:GetMass() ^ 2) ^ 2)) BodyAngularVelocity.angularvelocity = Vector3.new((math.random() - 0.5), (math.random() - 0.5), ((math.random() - 0.5) * 3)) BodyAngularVelocity.Parent = Pellet
Pellet.Parent = Character while MouseDown do local SpawnLocation = Mouse.Hit.p local SpawnDistance = 10 if (SpawnLocation - Torso.Position).magnitude > SpawnDistance then SpawnLocation = Torso.Position + (SpawnLocation - Torso.Position).unit * SpawnDistance end BodyPosition.position = SpawnLocation wait() end end end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() if Pellet then MouseDown = false Tool.Enabled = false Pellet.CanCollide = true BodyAngularVelocity:Destroy() BodyPosition:Destroy() Fire(CFrame.new(Torso.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint).lookVector, Pellet, 200, 35, 0.75) Pellet = nil wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false MouseDown = false if Void and Void.Parent then Void:Destroy() end if Pellet and Pellet.Parent then Pellet:Destroy() end Pellet = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
